review: Love the Fire Stick. Purchased mainly to use for Netflix and the remote adds a simplicity to the system making it family user friendly. I liked the easy set up and have already used in separate rooms at home. Before we felt confined to one room having to use wii console or blue ray console to access Netflix since we don't own smart tv's.  I highly recommend buying a second remote as I am doing since it is small and easily lost in couch cushions or recliner.
